channel.title: Just like the good ol' Haiz
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is a banner for my server, tell me what you think.
[img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/2i55c8.jpg[/img]
**Note** It didn't come out right due to the colors of the moparscape background, it looks better on a darker colored background.

item.title: Just like the good ol' Haiz
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:6, topic:500380”]Type text, stroke (white colour) 2px; change the text colour, draw a line and do the same with a glow.

Total time: 25 seconds (including any delays)
Total effort: 1/10
Overall design: 1/10

Why show off something that almost everybody can do? All I see is a show off of a crap name and crap text. (This can also be recreated in paint!)

Sorry[/quote]
Any genius could tell it would be way longer than 25 seconds, including delays. Sure, it’s a lazy logo, but 1/10 is pushing it. The color scheme is a little bad, the design is somewhat generic, but with a generous use of shadows and stroke, it makes a somewhat suitable design. Just because it’s low effort or minimalistic doesn’t make it bad. It could easily be improved but it’s nowhere near 1/10.

Read full topic
item.source: Just like the good ol' Haiz
